If \\( f(z) \\) is applied to a complex number \\( z_0 \\) at t = 0, and then the system is allowed to evolve under \\( \\frac{dz}{dt} = Mz \\) without further intervention, will \\( z(t) \\) at t = T be the same as if \\( z_0 \\) was directly evolved to t = T under \\( \\frac{dz}{dt} = Mz \\)?
